ttp_template:
<group name="local_interface_mgmt_address_neighbor_description_neighbor_interface">

Chassis id: {{NEIGHBOR_INTERFACE | ORPHRASE}}
System Name: {{NEIGHBOR_NAME | ORPHRASE}}

  IP: {{MGMT_ADDRESS | ORPHRASE}}
</group>

textfsm_template:
Value LOCAL_INTERFACE (\S+)
Value NEIGHBOR_INTERFACE (\S+) 
Value NEIGHBOR_NAME (\S+)
Value NEIGHBOR_DESCRIPTION (.+)
Value MGMT_ADDRESS (\S+)

Start
  ^Local\s+Intf:\s+${LOCAL_INTERFACE}
  ^Port\s+id:\s+${NEIGHBOR_INTERFACE}
  ^System\s+Name:\s+${NEIGHBOR_NAME}
  ^System\s+Description: -> GetDescription
  ^Management\s+Addresses: -> InMgmt
  ^Total\s+entries\s+displayed -> Record
  ^-+ -> Record
  ^\s*
  ^.* -> Continue

GetDescription
  ^${NEIGHBOR_DESCRIPTION} -> Start
  ^\s* -> GetDescription
  ^.* -> GetDescription

InMgmt
  ^\s*IP:\s+${MGMT_ADDRESS} -> Start
  ^\s* -> Start
  ^.* -> InMgmt
